casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Jonathon Lavon FRIEND El. No. 345P15-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. Jonathon Lavon Friend, for Friend, Jonathan Lavon. Joseph L. Flyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 18th of November 2015 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Forsyth and Davidson Counties:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015."
